title: Quarkus 2.10.0.Final released - Preliminary work on Loom's virtual threads and various refinements all over the place
content: New month, new Quarkus feature release, you know the drill: Quarkus 2.10.0.Final has landed. This version is a mix of exploratory work and refinements on existing extensions: Preliminary work on Loomâ€™s virtual threads GraphQL non-blocking support Kubernetes service binding support for Reactive SQL Clients CacheKeyGenerator for cache extension And much...
